channel.title: Destortion - 24/7 PROTECTED VPS - NEED STAFF & PLAYERS
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hi,
I have currently worked on this project for a while, and It's my time to contribute it to the players who want to play a server.. I did not make this server for any money purpose and I just made this for the purpose of Enjoying. Most owners nowadays are just money greedy - but in this server, we offer something different. Our server contain's mature staff that is just like our players and we also like to chill, have fun & share with our players. We've spent endless amount of hours trying to build up what we have today even though we have a very basic knowledge of java & other programming languages.
~Mohd & Kron - Owner/Developer[/CENTER]
[B][SIZE=5][URL=http://"destortion.com"]Forums/Webclient[/URL][/SIZE][/B]
[COLOR="#FF0000"][B]This is not a Pk'ing server - it's economy[/B][/COLOR]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/Screenshot_4-2_zps588d1663.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/Screenshot_1-6_zpsae04faa2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l599/mohd16/Screenshot_5_zpsa02a73b0.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: Destortion - 24/7 PROTECTED VPS - NEED STAFF & PLAYERS
item.dc:creator: @Destortion Destortion
item.description:
@Destortion wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:2, topic:518680”]nice GE you have there. Do you actually have BH in there or just maps?

Supply more information about the economy and how it’s planned out to be developed.

[hr]

Good luck[/quote]

It has bounty hunter, not just the maps - the full system.

Read full topic
item.source: Destortion - 24/7 PROTECTED VPS - NEED STAFF & PLAYERS
